website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and quiet, this highly affordable option will surprise you with its quietness.
pros: and withstanding both extreme heat and cold, you'll find this umbrella creates a comfortable hunting experience
cons: Take extra care and time setting up the equipment to prevent breakage

customer_reviews.title: not as shown
customer_reviews.text: there is a cut out in the back to put around the tree, the photo shows it just being pushed up against the tree is why I bought it . I hunt state land with state owned stands that are stand alone not connected to a tree so a full umbrella is what I was looking for .
customer_reviews.author: yokota85

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it during hunting season!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for myself several years ago, use it while deer hunting. So simple to put up either in a tree while in a climbing stand or still hunting on the ground and tie around limbs. Liked it so much I purchased one for my husband and my sons girlfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Underside alignment guides needs to be tweaked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this umbrella in Aug/19 to set up on a permanent stand. Setup is easy, umbrella is tight and in theory works until a little wind. Problem is guide strings on the underside of the umbrella are made of COTTON and will eventually break. This causes the metal supports to go out of alignment and break. I coated the top with water repellant and it does work. Umbrella was outside in the elements for 3mths. If they fixed this problem I believe you could get a good season or more out of it but until they do I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, I wasn't expecting much from this product, but I was tired of getting soaked in my tree stands, so I thought I'd take a chance. This thing works really well. It's easy to set up and provides significant cover. I used it last night and it kept me very dry, even though there were intermittent bursts of heavy rain. High winds might challenge it, but that's true with any umbrella. I'd buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B. Barbo

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to put up. I'll be using this on my elk hunt this year for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good product but don’t leave it out when you’re gone.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella works great but don’t leave it on your stand when you leave. Wind will destroy it. And, over time, the colors change, turning mostly red.
customer_reviews.author: BNC

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a larger old model I've had for years. It gives more coverage than I expected for a more compact size than my old one. Easy enough to screw it into pine, but I might would want to make a bracket for hardwoods (unless you carry a cordless drill).
customer_reviews.author: Barry White

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, held up on one rainy hunt so far
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, held up on one rainy hunt so far. Wind wasn't too bad but it was still doing what it was intended to do. Install took a few minutes but worked great once it was up. Will update review after some more use.
customer_reviews.author: iEstrada9000

customer_reviews.title: Gotcha covered
customer_reviews.text: It came just in time and kept me mostly dry. It’s simple enough that it put it up in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E.

customer_reviews.title: can not be used as a ground blind.
customer_reviews.text: can not be used as a ground blind. awkward and makes way too much noise but works as an umbrella just fine
customer_reviews.author: Noella Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great value. A must have.
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Easy to set up and really help with shedding rain, or snow. For me, this will remain a must have for tree stand hunting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Color is different than pictured on mine
customer_reviews.text: The structure of the umbrella is great but the color is off from the color as it appears in the Amazon description. It is lighter with an orange/pink tint to it when the sun shines through it.
customer_reviews.author: D. N. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Best tree stand umbrella yet!
customer_reviews.text: What a great tree stand umbrella! Set up is easy. A whole lot better than more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.author: MIKE HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Good but.....
customer_reviews.text: Works great but you have to handle it with extreme caution when setting up and taking down to avoid breaking anything. Not the most durable thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sat twice in rain no problems shot two out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sat twice in rain no problems shot two out of stand never spooked any deer so far love it highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water leak through. What's a umbrella good for if water leaks through?
customer_reviews.text: Water leak through. What's a umbrella good for if water leaks through?
customer_reviews.author: JYM

customer_reviews.title: Kept me dry my first day
customer_reviews.text: Kept me dry my first day in the woods this year
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but inside rods where bent when i opened it upon receiving it. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Camowoods

customer_reviews.title: High and Dry...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you dry... Could be a bit wider. Say 60”.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but seems as if it will work great
customer_reviews.author: Marty Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Cheep leaks! Ends pull out go buy umbrella break off rod bam way better!!
customer_reviews.author: john kolesar

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Worked well on a split tree. Lots of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Blind Camo
customer_reviews.text: I love the Umbrella had no problem with it. Easy to set up. I would recommend it to other hunters.
customer_reviews.author: Klilly

customer_reviews.title: I'm hoping he'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. I'm hoping he'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works well in the rain and moderate winds. Would not leave up if a chance of strong storms. Good product for price.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the rain off, Screws into tree.
customer_reviews.text: It Keeps the rain off. Screws into the tree, unfortunatly.(I don't think this was mentioned in description) I had to weld up a system to be able to strap it to the tree. Works good after modifications. Great seller, buy from them often. Pretty fast shipping. I hope to, one day, see this in a vertigo camo, until then this gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella blind camo
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would give one a try. Looks like it should work fine. Install method appears as it has to be.
customer_reviews.author: K7racer

customer_reviews.title: Color and Style
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the one as pictured/Advertised. The advertised one was green. The one I got was practically red.
customer_reviews.author: Kwa

customer_reviews.title: Good for light breeze during rain or snow
customer_reviews.text: Relatively quick install. Sideways snow still gets you but upper half of body and head stayed dry. Used for November deer hunting
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: One of the rib supports was kinked right out of the box. The umbrella leaked around the middle post and from a couple seams. The part that screws into the tree is still stuck in the tree after the first use. The cheap plastic ring, that is the only thing you can grip to screw the thing into and out of the tree, is not connected well enough to the metal screw. It just unscrews, leaving the screw in the tree - useless! It is Cheaply made and will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: leaked
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas and used it twice before deer season ended 12/31. 1st time it worked great and the second time the seams were leaking. I will just seal the seams and recoat with waterproofing but it seems to me it ought to work more than once. Design is perfect for a saddle hunter like me.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size cover.
customer_reviews.text: Leaving a 4 star due to the quality of the fabric. Time will tell if it actually lasts the hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

product_meta.title: HUNTRITE Camo Umbrella Blind
product_meta.description: If it looks like rain or you don't want the sun beating on your face, simply attach this Huntrite Umbrella Blind to a tree above your stand. Don't need overhead protection? Then lay it on its side and use it as an ultra-portable ground blind! For the hunter who likes to pack light and stay on the move, there's no better option than the Huntrite Umbrella Blind! Strong, durable steel frame for season-after-season use; Vented top minimizes movement from wind; Folds down small into the included storage sack; Screws into trees easily for easy mounting; Dimensions: 54" diameter; Weight: 2 lbs.
